SEARCH
Package service

Class FineService

java.lang.Object
service.FineService
public class FineService extends Object
Author:
khadeja and masa Service class to handle all fine-related operations in the library system. This includes adding fines, finding fines for users, and paying fines.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FineService()
    Default constructor initializing DAO and service instances.
    FineService(FineDAO fineDAO, LoanService loanService, LoansDAO loansDAO)
    Constructor with dependency injection.

    findeAlluserfines(String userid)
    Finds all fines for a given user ID.
    String
    payFine(String userid, String fineid)

  • Constructor Details

    • FineService

      public FineService()
      Default constructor initializing DAO and service instances.

    • FineService

      public FineService(FineDAO fineDAO, LoanService loanService, LoansDAO loansDAO)
      Constructor with dependency injection.
      Parameters:
      fineDAO - DAO for fine operations
      loanService - Service for loan operations
      loansDAO - DAO for loan operations

  • Method Details

    • addbookFine

      public String addbookFine(Fine fine)
      Adds a fine to the system for a specific loan.
      Parameters:
      fine - Fine object containing loan ID and fine details
      Returns:
      Success or error message

    • findeAlluserfines

      public List<Fine> findeAlluserfines(String userid)
      Finds all fines for a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userid - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      List of Fine objects; returns empty list if none found or invalid input

    • payFine

      public String payFine(String userid, String fineid)
      Pays a fine for a user and returns the book if the fine is active.
      Parameters:
      userid - The ID of the user
      fineid - The ID of the fine
      Returns:
      Message indicating success, failure, or if loan hasn't expired
